name: Marble House: Remembrance
description:
Remembrance is a mini-game prototype for the visual novel Marble House and submission to Bara Jam 2022.

Please Note: this is a short prototype that introduces the memory mini-game. For the narrative demo, please visit the game's main page.

A weekend at an exclusive men’s spa, Marble House, goes awry when a gruesome discovery is made. Recover Lucas's missing memories by aligning his shattered memory fragments.

Marble House is a gay murder mystery visual novel currently under development. The demo is available for PC.
